entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5.
